extensions.description:
AI-powered Azure development assistant. Describe what you want to build,
and Copilot builds and deploys it to Azure. Includes 16 specialized agents
and 29 Azure skills.

examples.name: interactive
examples.description: Start an interactive AI development session

examples.name: prompt
examples.usage: azd copilot -p "build me a REST API for managing products"

examples.name: agent
examples.description: Use a specific agent for specialized tasks

examples.description: Start an interactive AI development session

examples.name: prompt
examples.usage: azd copilot -p "build me a REST API for managing products"

examples.name: agent
examples.description: Use a specific agent for specialized tasks

extensions.description: azd exec - Run any script with azd environment and Azure credentials. Database migrations, setup automation, CI/CD workflows - with seamless Key Vault integration.

examples.description: Listen for script execution via named pipe
